SOLOS ENDOSCOPY 
INC




Solos Endoscopy, Inc. Enters Talks to 
								Introduce Breast Endoscopy System to Over 250 
								Hospitals Throughout Mexico


								5/9/2007

  


  









Signs Distributor and 
								Files Registration to Sell Breast Endoscopy 
								System in Mexico

								BOSTON, MA, May 09, 2007 (MARKET WIRE via COMTEX 
								News Network) -- 
Solos 
								Endoscopy, Inc. (PINKSHEETS: SLSY) is 
								pleased to announce that the 

								Company has signed a 
								distribution agreement with General Commerce and 
								Trade S.A. de C.V. of Monterey, Mexico. General 
								Commerce and Trade is in the process of 
								registering the Solos Breast Endoscopy System 
								for general sale in Mexico and is assisting the 
								Company with negotiations to introduce the Solos 
								Breast Endoscopy System to the more than 250 
								hospitals throughout the country worth a 
								potential $2,500,000 in revenue. 
"There is a huge 
								potential for 

								sales in Mexico and we 
								are working with the most important and 
								influential surgeons in the country to help us 
								make additional contacts within government 
								agencies and the healthcare system," stated Joe 
								Gassman, Vice President of International Sales 
								for Solos Endoscopy, Inc. 
"Mexico 
								currently relies heavily on reactive treatments 
								to breast cancer, but is now considering ways of 
								becoming more proactive in curing this disease. 
								They are closely examining our Breast Endoscopy 
								System in order to detect breast cancer earlier 
								and to reduce the number of patients on 
								expensive drawn-out treatment procedures. This 
								will ultimately reduce the burden on the 
								government's medical 

								insurance system," 
								stated Dom Gatto, Vice President of Solos 
								Endoscopy, Inc. 
Solos 
								Endoscopy, Inc. recently announced that the 
								Company's Breast Endoscopy System was featured 
								in the "Product Showcase" section of Surgical 
								Products Magazine in the March issue. The 
								article focused on the Breast Endoscopy System's 
								functions that allow physicians direct 
								visualization, while examining dramatically 
								smaller sized lesions in the mammary ducts than 
								is currently possible through mammography.
								

About Solos 
								Endoscopy, Inc.: 
Solos 
								Endoscopy, Inc. is a healthcare technology 
								company whose mission is to develop and market 
								breakthrough technology, applications, medical 
								devices, and procedural techniques for the 
								screening, diagnosis, treatment and 

								management of medical 
								conditions. Backed by technical support, Solos' 
								sales team can help make the right buying 
								decisions for the hospital, surgery center, or 
								physician office. Additional information is 
								available on the Company's Web site at 
								www.solosendoscopy.com. 
Safe Harbor:

								anticipated actions.
